title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1001 - Public Access To Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1001 - Public Access To Records

State Regulations
§ 1001.1 - Definitions
§ 1001.2 - Purpose
§ 1001.3 - Applications for and the inspection and copying of records
§ 1001.4 - Prevention of unwarranted invasions of personal privacy
§ 1001.5 - Records not available for inspection or copying
§ 1001.6 - Maintenance of certain records
§ 1001.7 - Appeals from denials of access to records
§ 1001.8 - Fee for copies
§ 1001.9 to 1001.22 - Repealed
§ 1001.23 to 1001.31 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1001

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
